page.title: 17HEALTH IN FORDYCE
page.content: Health in Fordyce is looked after by 2 doctors and 2 health visitors based in Portsoy.A Mother and Baby Clinic is held monthly in the Village hall, at present attended by 7 mothers.There is a Dentist and Chemist in Portsoy and the School Doctor,Dentist and Health Visitor visit annually.The nearest general hospitals are in Banff and Buckie,the Campbell Hospital,Portsoy, being for Convalescent or geriatric patients only. The water supply for Fordyce and district comes from Leich- estown via a cistern at Little Dytach. Refuse is collected each Wednesday by Banff & Buchan District's Cleansing Dept. Sewage works on the outskirts of Fordyce,well hidden by evergreen trees,were completed in l965.A fence of concrete posts and wire netting keeps people away from danger.Here clean water is put back into the Burn.
